headline: Avery Dennison Corporation (NYSE:AVY): A Compounder Facing Minor Hiccups
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Avery Dennison Corporation (NYSE:AVY) on ValueInvestorsClub by jso1123. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on AVY. The company’s shares were trading at $183.00 when this thesis was published, vs. the closing price of $170.85 on Apr 17. AVY is a materials science and digital identification […]
